metadata.synopsis: The dialog after we got arrested and thrown in Moonrise Prison / Corpse Pit. The companion (if present) is sarcastic about our previous statement (before being captured) where we said that we would be able to sneak past the army without any issues.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Well. This is quite the mess you've gotten us into.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: If the first char chose to procceed in TWN_MarchingArmy_Arrest then here the second char makes a sarcastic comments about it (like, "you really thought they wouldn't catch us")

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Damn it all. I should've known better than to stray so close.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: If the first char chose to procceed in TWN_MarchingArmy_Arrest then here the second char makes a sarcastic comments about it (like, "you really thought they wouldn't catch us")
